MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 postcode area of Newtongrange. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to finalise the repairs affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30pm on Saturday 17th April 2021
